base_description: Silver faucet set with traditional design.
part_description: Includes a curved spout and two separate handles. The spout is centrally positioned, with handles symmetrically placed on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The spout connects internally to the handles, allowing water flow control. Each handle adjusts water temperature and pressure, directing it through the central spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet interacts with plumbing systems, directing water into sinks. Users turn handles to control water flow and temperature for washing or cleaning tasks.
